text: Nim'ma (vicchedita) mahileyara paiki rtu sravada kuritu nirasaragiruvavara (rtusrava nintavara) avadhiya visayadalli nimage sansayaviddare, avara avadhi muru tingalagide. Innu rtusrava arambhavagilladavarigu idu anvayisuttade. Garbhiniyara avadhiyu prasavadavaregiruttade. Allahanu, tannannu anjuvavanige avana vyavaharagalannu sulabhagolisi koduttane
